summary.para: The EMRGRADIENTFILL structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

remarks.para: This is a variable-length structure. The Ver member designates the beginning of the variable-length area. First comes an array of nVer structures to pass the vertices. Next comes an array of either nTri structures or nTri structures, depending on the value of ulMode (triangles or rectangles).
This structure is to be used during metafile playback.

summary.para: The base structure for all record types.
The bounding rectangle, in device units.
The number of rectangles or triangles to be passed to .
The gradient fill mode. This member can be one of the following values.

description.para: In this mode, two endpoints describe a rectangle. The rectangle is defined to have a constant color (specified by the structure) for the left and right edges. GDI interpolates the color from the left to right edge and fills the interior.

In this mode, two endpoints describe a rectangle. The rectangle is defined to have a constant color (specified by the structure) for the top and bottom edges. GDI interpolates the color from the top to bottom edge and fills the interior.

In this mode, an array of structures is passed to GDI along with a list of array indexes that describe separate triangles. GDI performs linear interpolation between triangle vertices and fills the interior. Drawing is done directly in 24- and 32-bpp modes. Dithering is performed in 16-, 8-, 4-, and 1-bpp mode.

summary.para: An array of structures that each define a vertex.
